Detailed Description

RTRShmMOServer is a helper class which instatiates an instance of RTRServerSharedMemoryRoot (and conditionally RTRSharedMemoryStats) as indicated by either the config db or information passed in on the constructor.

RTRShmMOServer utilizes a portion of the shared memory segment created by RTRShmServer for storing managed objects.

See Also:
RTRServerSharedMemoryRoot, RTRSharedMemoryStats, RTRShmServer
